snippet: Scott Machado, Iona’s senior point guard, is passing his way to prominence, averaging 10 assists a game and drawing N.B.A. scouts despite recently learning he is nearsighted.
abstract: Iona College senior point guard Scott Machado is passing his way to prominence, averaging 10 assists a game and drawing the attention of NBA scouts despite recent revelation that he is nearsighted.
lead_paragraph: Scott Machado, Iona’s senior point guard, is passing his way to prominence, averaging 10 assists a game and drawing N.B.A. scouts despite recently learning he is nearsighted.

headline.seo: Iona Guard Scott Machado Passes His Way to Prominence
headline.main: Iona Guard Has Vision but Needs Glasses
headline.print_headline: A Guard With Vision But Who Needs Glasses
